statements: SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_id, data_location FROM backups WHERE backup_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_size > 1000 ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_location FROM backups WHERE backup_size < 500 ORDER BY backup_id;
SELECT backup_id, backup_size FROM backups WHERE data_location = 's3://bucket-name';
SELECT * FROM backups ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC, backup_size ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT backup_id, data_location FROM backups WHERE backup_size > 1000
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE data_location LIKE '%/path/%'
SELECT DISTINCT data_location FROM backups ORDER BY data_location ASC
SELECT AVG(backup_size) AS average_size, MAX(backup_size) AS max_size FROM backups
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recovery_processes WHERE process_status = 'completed' ORDER BY process_start_time ASC;
SELECT process_name, process_start_time FROM recovery_processes WHERE process_start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_location LIKE '%folder%';
SELECT * FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY backup_date ASC;
SELECT process_name, process_status, process_start_time FROM recovery_processes WHERE process_start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_id, backup_size, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_size > 100;
SELECT * FROM recovery_logs ORDER BY recovery_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM backup_policies WHERE retention_period > INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_date BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01' AND TIMESTAMP '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_date < NOW()
SELECT backup_id, backup_size FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM backup_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE 'Daily%'
SELECT * FROM recovery_logs WHERE recovered_data ILIKE '%important%' ORDER BY recovery_date ASC
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(policy_id) AS policy_count FROM backup_policies GROUP BY policy_name ORDER BY policy_count DESC
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_size > 1000;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM backup_logs WHERE log_timestamp <= NOW();
SELECT recovery_status, recovery_timestamp FROM recovery_logs ORDER BY recovery_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC, backup_size ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_size > 1000 ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_logs bl JOIN backups b ON bl.backup_id = b.id WHERE bl.log_timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT b.backup_name, rh.recovery_result FROM backups b JOIN recovery_logs rl ON b.id = rl.backup_id JOIN recovery_history rh ON rl.recovery_id = rh.recovery_id WHERE rh.recovery_status = 'Successful' ORDER BY rh.recovery_time DESC;

SELECT b.backup_name, COUNT(rl.recovery_id) AS successful_recoveries FROM backups b JOIN recovery_logs rl ON b.id = rl.backup_id JOIN recovery_history rh ON rl.recovery_id = rh.recovery_id WHERE rh.recovery_status = 'Successful' GROUP BY b.backup_name HAVING successful_recoveries > 2;
SELECT * FROM backup_logs;
SELECT id, backup_time, backup_status FROM backup_policies ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, storage_capacity FROM backup_locations WHERE storage_type = 'Cloud';
SELECT job_id, start_time, end_time, status FROM backup_jobs WHERE status = 'Success' ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT job_id, recovery_time, recovery_status FROM recovery_logs WHERE recovery_status = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_status = 'Success';
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM backup_policies WHERE backup_frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT location_name, storage_type, storage_capacity FROM backup_locations ORDER BY storage_capacity DESC;
SELECT job_id, start_time, end_time, status FROM backup_jobs WHERE status = 'Failed' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_logs WHERE recovery_status = 'Partial' LIMIT 5;
